com.bluegosling.concurrent.scheduler

Interface ScheduledTaskListener<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of value returned by the task

    public interface ScheduledTaskListener<V>
    A listener for completions of ScheduledTasks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void taskCompleted(ScheduledTask<? extends V> task)
      Called when the specified task completes (either normally or abnormally).

    • Method Detail

      • taskCompleted

        void taskCompleted(ScheduledTask<? extends V> task)
        Called when the specified task completes (either normally or abnormally). Successful and failed tasks can easily be distinguished using FluentFuture.isSuccessful() and FluentFuture.isFailed().
        Parameters:
        task - the completed task
